trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Troy
There were no other sightings in Troy on or around June 11th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside in my back yard with my dog. I was looking up at my black walnut tree when I saw a very bright light to my left. My first thought was that it was a firework except that it was far away and large. It moving to the Northeast at a very high rate of speed. I've seen shooting stars before but, this was bigger and seemed much closer.
Summary: I saw what looked like a bright roman candle fireball move quickly to the Northeast
